archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0505
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a credit manager, I want to be able to modify the interest free credit decisioning rules when I like, so I can fine tune the decisioning when I like.

properties.value: Rules are configured in the system by Comarch. A change would require Comarch intervention. Finetunung of existing rules may be just a change of parameter (quick). New rules may require more work. Park for dedicated session.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
